page.title: 10My first school
page.content: Our school looks like a church. On the porch there are{two foxes}carved, but their noses have weathered and they look like bats! Every year there is a{swallow's nest}on the roof beam. Near the ground is an OS benchmark - 162.52ft above sealevel. I was in the 'little class' for three years. I remember the{initial {teaching alphabet,}and one particular outing when we went to sea on a paddle steamer, the Waverley. This term we saw the Queen arriving at Colchester. I'm{School Captain}this week and have to ring the bell at schooltime. We wear royal blue cardigans for our uniform. Yesterday my Mum took me shopping because I'm going to boarding school at Hockerill next term. I'm looking forward to it in a way but after{six years}you feel sad about leaving.
